鍭字的基本解释

鍭
hóu
古代用于打猎的一种箭：“杀矢、鍭矢，用诸近射田猎。”
箭头：“殊胜弯弓命镞鍭。”

鍭字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hóu］
［《廣韻》户鉤切，平侯，匣。］
［《廣韻》胡遘切，去候，匣。］
(1)即鍭矢。
(2)泛指箭。
(3)指箭镞。
(4)矛之属。
(5)通“翭”。羽根。亦用为量词。

鍭字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　鍭； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1315第04
【唐韻】乎鉤切【集韻】【韻會】胡溝切【正韻】胡鉤切，?音侯。【爾雅·釋器】金鏃翦羽謂之鍭。【註】今之錍箭是也。鍭猶?也，?物而射之。【詩·大雅】四鍭旣鈞。【疏】鍭矢，參亭三分之，一在前，二在後，輕重鈞亭也。【揚子·方言】關西曰箭，江淮謂之鍭。【班固·西都賦】列刃鑽鍭。　又或作翭。【禮·喪禮】翭矢一乗。又【廣韻】胡遘切【集韻】下遘切【韻會】【正韻】胡茂切，?音?。義同。

考證：〔【班固·東都賦】列刃鑽鍭。〕　謹照原文東都賦改西都賦。

鍭
Basic explanation of words
鍭
hóu
A kind of arrow used for hunting in ancient times: "Kill the arrow and the ghost arrow, shoot the field with all the distances for hunting."
Arrow: "Successful bend bow fate."
鍭
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［hóu］
["Guangyun" household hook-cut, Pinghou, box. ]
["Guangyun" Hu Dun cut, go to wait, box. ]
(1) That is the ghost arrow.
(2) Generally refers to arrows.
(3) Refers to the arrowhead.
(4) Belonging to the spear.
(5) Through "翭". Feather. Also used as a quantifier.
鍭
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Su Ji 1] [Golden Word Department] 　鍭; Kangxi strokes: 17; Page number: page 1315 04
[Tang Yun] Hugouqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Hugouqie [Zhengyun] Hugouqie,? Yinhou. 【Erya·Release Device】Golden Yu Jianyu is called 鍭. [Note] Today's arrow is also. Wei You? Also, shoot it at the object. 【Poetry·Daya】Si Yaojun Jun. [Sparse] Wu Shi, three-thirds of the pavilion, one in the front and the second in the back, the light and heavy Jun pavilion. [Yangtze Dialect] Guanxi said arrow, Jianghuai said it is "moon". 【Banggu·Xidufu】The row of blade drills.　Or Zuohong. 【Ritual·Funeral】Hung Shi Yicheng. And [Guang Yun] Hu Junqie [Jiyun] Xia Junqie [Yunhui] [Zhengyun] Hu Maoqie, "Yin?". The same meaning.
